text: After their victory over the Black Grail and the Hand of Nagash, the time has come for the Grudgebringers to face the Dread King. Volkmar the Grim has tracked the Dark Lord to the Black Pyramid, a place of great evil hidden within the Land of the Dead - an endless expanse of sand dunes and death. With the support of Emperor Karl Franz, Morgan Bernhardt's mercenary band march on to foil this dark omen or die trying!
Founder and commander of the mercenary company called the Grudgebringers, named after Morgan's magic sword Grudgebringer.

After spending countless seasons wandering the shadowy Black Mountains, Ceridan, a solitary Elf Ranger, learned of precious knowledge that had unwittingly fallen into Skaven hands. Troubled by Skaven forces hot on his trail, the ranger went into hiding, taking on a new guise, and sought help for a perilous mission that had been passed down for ages in his family. Fortunately for him. Morgan Bernhardt is the best help money can buy.

Luther has a reputation for being headstrong, conceited, and having a fiery temper that matches his magical prowess. His time at the Bright College in Nuln came to an end after he got into a heated argument with a colleague, resulting in a blaze that engulfed a tavern and neighboring structures. Although a skilled wizard, Luther's tendency towards instability is a cause for concern.

I want to LEAD!! exclaimed Morgan, slamming his tankard on the table. "I have the knowledge, I have the skill, and you can follow me if you will! How many years have you been scraping for a living-five, ten, fifteen? Well, show me the men and I'll put together a fighting force to shame the Reiksguard and the Panthers and the whining White Wolfs of Middenheim to boot!" Morgan's eyes were blazing with fury and inspired determination. "Are you with me? Well, ARE YOU?!" - Captain Morgan Bernhardt, founding the Grudgebringer company
You're going into hell, Bernhardt!\\n\\n"I was born there; and call me Commander!"\\n\\n - exchange between Matthias, Witch Hunter General and Commander Morgan Bernhardt of the Grudgebringers

Don't really hold with swords these days. But I'd a real beaut' when I was younger... hee hee... I wonder what happened to it?\\n"Blessed Sigmar. Someone's set the Black Grail loose in Bretonnia. I thought we'd put a stop to that."\\n- Franz Lohner, owner of the Red Moon Inn, Ubersreik
The Grungebringers will hold until paid their bloody gold!.\\n -The Grungebringers' motto.
My name's Urblab Rotgut. \\"That's your problem"\\n"It's an honorable name among ogres, my name is."\\n - exchange between the Ogre Maneater Urblab Rotgut and Commander Morgan Bernhardt
We'll part cold flesh with cold steel - PREPARE TO ENGAGE!\\n - Commander Bernhardt
